meanings.definition: to prepare or arrange something in advance
meanings.sent1: I always prefranks my outfit the night before to save time in the morning.
meanings.sent2: She prefranks her meals for the week on Sundays.
meanings.sent3: The students decided to prefranks their presentation to impress their teacher.
meanings.sent4: The team prefranks their strategy before every game to ensure victory.
meanings.sent5: Prefranking your schedule can help you stay organized and efficient.

meanings.definition: a set of pre-stamped envelopes for mailing
meanings.sent1: I bought a pack of prefranks to use for my business correspondence.
meanings.sent2: The office manager ordered prefranks for the entire staff.
meanings.sent3: The post office ran out of prefranks, causing a delay in mail delivery.
meanings.sent4: She kept a stack of prefranks on her desk for easy access.
meanings.sent5: Using prefranks saves time at the post office.

meanings.definition: already stamped or marked for mailing
meanings.sent1: The prefranks envelopes were ready to be sent out.
meanings.sent2: He used prefranks stationery for his business letters.
meanings.sent3: The prefranks packages made the shipping process quick and easy.
meanings.sent4: She received a prefranks postcard from her friend.
meanings.sent5: Prefranks letters are convenient for busy individuals.
